name: Juarez Barbosa Junior
title: Sr. Principal Java Developer Evangelist
bio: I'm Juarez Junior, Senior Principal Java Developer Evangelist - DevRel Director at Oracle. Previously, an Azure Developer Relations Lead at Microsoft, a Principal Developer Advocate - Blockchain at Oracle, and a Thought Leader and Technical Evangelist at IBM. I have over 20 years of professional experience in Software Engineering and Developer Relations, mainly as a Software Architect, Software Engineer, and Developer Advocate. I have extensive experience and knowledge in Cloud Computing (Oracle OCI, Azure, GCP, IBM Cloud, and AWS), DevOps, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Continuous Integration / Delivery (CI/CD), and Cloud Native. Also, I am a polyglot Software Engineer with experience in Java, Kotlin, Golang, Python, C, C++, and Javascript, and lately, I have been learning Rust.
